translations: 干酪质的（cheesy 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: And I'm thinking OMG. That is the cheesiest, pick up line ever!
sentences.translation: 我在想，这真是世界上最愚蠢的搭讪呀！

sentences.sentence: His line «I’m the king of the world!» in the film Titanic is dubbed the cheesiest line in movie history.
sentences.translation: 他在影片“泰坦尼克号”中的台词“我是世界之王”被评为电影史上最糟糕的台词。

sentences.sentence: It had the graphics of a highly produced Hollywood-like video with the voice-over of the cheesiest television commercial presenter you could imagine.
sentences.translation: 视频的图像制作水平之高，可比好莱坞电影，而配音是你所能想象到的那种最低级的电视推销员的声音。
